refnamediv.refpurpose: Set the function used to compute the datatip string.

listitem.para: A variable that contains a function (type==11 or type==13). This function calling sequence must be str=fun(curve, pt, index) where curve is the handle of the polyline associated with the datatip, pt is the vector of datatip coordinates and index is the mesh point index of the datatip point or the index of the previous mesh point if interpolation is allowed.
This function must return a string or a vector of strings in str.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Set the function used to format the text to be displayed at the datatip point.
